title: Well, it happened again
body:
https://s4.postimg.org/qrn4k33rh/korra_is_sad.jpg

Busty Demoness blacklisted me. This time he made an ironic post about the enemy team not acknowledging that his ashe was just as cancerous as the singed, soraka, and yasuo that played worse. I didn't get the irony and thought he was complaining that they didn't recognize he had pwned them, so I thought he was being a dick. 

then he blacklisted me 

Our relationship has been a tumultuous one. Either I do something, I say something, or he says something that we don't agree with; and he ends up blacklisting me even though I want to still be friends. I guess it was never meant to be, even though I like the guy. 

He has since deleted the thread in question, but the wounds my soul has suffered still remain.
